leaveEmptyIfNoChange: Leave Empty if Not Changing Password

tag.confirmDelete: Are You Sure You Want to Delete This Tag?

shop.purchaseConfirm: Are You Sure You Want to Purchase This Package?
shop.durationInvalid: Please Enter a Valid Rental Duration (number greater than 0)
shop.noRentTip: You do not have any rented accounts
shop.deleteConfirm: Are You Sure You Want to Delete This Package?
shop.autoUpdateTip: This action may lead to risk control issues, consider carefully
shop.purchaseSuccessWithLimit: Purchase Successful, Accounts Exceeding Limit Automatically Disabled
shop.rentPeriodTooShort: The rental period cannot be less than {:min} days
shop.functionPriceSettingTip:
Please set the corresponding price for the function here. All prices are on a monthly basis, and the actual charge is calculated daily. A value less than zero disables the function.

All time interval price settings should be filled in JSON format.

Example: {"1-9":10, "10-20":5} means 10 units for 1 to 9 minutes, and 5 units for 10 to 20 minutes.
shop.adminPermission: No fees will be charged to the administrator account
shop.priceTip: The price is for reference only. It is displayed as a monthly rate, while actual charges are calculated daily.
shop.priceDiffTip: New functions will deduct the daily price difference.
shop.rentAccountInUse: This account is currently in use and cannot be rented
shop.enterNewAccountID: Please enter the new account ID
shop.rentDeleteConfirm: Are You Sure You Want to Delete This Rental?
shop.priceDataInvalid: The function price configuration is incorrect. Please contact the administrator.
shop.priceDataInvalidAdmin: The function price configuration is incorrect. Please check if the time range is valid.

account.batchAddTip:
Format: email----password----question1----answer1----question2----answer2----question3----answer3----birthday
Example: aaa@qq.com----123456----What was the name of your best friend in your youth?----111----What is your dream job?----222----Where did your parents meet?----333----1990/1/1
account.frontendRemarkTip: Explanation of the account, displayed on the sharing page
account.questionTip: Only the keywords of 'question' are needed, but be mindful of the language of security questions
account.question: Question
account.confirmDelete: Are You Sure You Want to Delete This Account?
account.checkPasswordCorrectTip: Automatically reset password if it has been changed
account.deleteDevicesTip: Automatically delete devices associated with the account
account.autoUpdatePwdTip: During each task, if the time since the last password change exceeds the set value, a password change is performed.
account.checkStoreTip: Check whether the account can log into the AppStore, and automatically disable if it cannot
account.changeRegionTip: Automatically change the account region when it is detected that the account region does not match the preset region
account.accountInfoCheckDetail: Including: deletion of device, account language detection, account name detection
account.updateAccountNameTip: When it is detected that the account name does not match the default value, the account name is automatically updated. Leave blank to not detect the account name
account.langCheckTip: Detect the account language setting and automatically update the account language if it does not match the default value
account.removeLostModeTip: Automatically remove the device from Lost Mode from iCloud search to prevent the device from being locked. Due to iCloud limitations, the task time will increase after enabling this feature. Do not enable it unless necessary.

redeem.success: Redeem Successful, Redirecting to Account Page
redeem.noAvailableAccount: No Available Account, Please Contact Administrator

action.confirmBatchAction: Are you sure you want to perform batch action?

domain.deleteConfirm: Are You Sure You Want to Delete This Domain?

proxy.deleteConfirm: Are You Sure You Want to Delete This Proxy?
proxy.typeAlertContent:
1. Authentication Format:
• If username/password is required, format: username:password@IP:port
• HTTP proxies support authentication, SOCKS5 proxies do not support authentication
2. Proxy Extraction API Usage:
• Select proxy type: http+url or socks5+url
• Ensure API extraction quantity is 1
• API response must contain only proxy address, no other content
3. Direct Proxy Usage:
• When selecting http or socks5 type, no protocol prefix needed in address field
• Simply enter IP:port

user.deleteConfirm: Are You Sure You Want to Delete This User?
user.disableSelf: You cannot disable your own account
user.downgradeSelf: You cannot remove your own admin privileges

unLicensedMsg: Please contact the administrator to obtain a license

share.onlyAllowAuthDomain: Only Authorized Domains Allowed to Access
share.accountCountTip: Each time the share page is accessed, a random number of N accounts will be obtained
share.inputAccountNum: Please enter the number of accounts
share.numInvalid: The number of accounts must be a positive integer
share.enableObfuscationDescription: When enabled, the information on the share page will be obfuscated to increase the difficulty of crawler cracking, but it will not affect normal user access.
share.enableCaptchaDescription: When enabled, the share page will require users to pass CAPTCHA verification to access.
share.visitLimitReached: The visit limit has been reached, please try again later
share.visitLimitTip: After the page reaches the visit limit, accounts will no longer be displayed. Leave blank for no limit

setting.name: Website Name
setting.enableShareRandom: Enable Random Order for Shared Accounts
setting.enableFooterCopyrightDescription: Footer file can be customized. Located at /resources/view/footer.tpl
setting.defaultShareTemplateDescription: Place share page templates in /resources/view/share/theme directory
setting.webdriverDescription: WebDriver address, do not add a trailing slash. Use Docker internal IP if public IP is unavailable. Format: http://username:password@ip:port. See tutorial for details.
setting.enableProxyAutoDisableDescription: Automatically disables proxies when backend reports them as unavailable.
setting.shareExpireDaysDescription: Share pages will be automatically deleted after N days. Set less than 0 to disable deletion.
setting.disableCountDescription: Automatically disable account after N failures.
setting.retryDelayDescription: Interval before retrying failed tasks. Set to 0 to wait for the next check.
setting.verifyEmailDescription: An email verification code is required during registration. When CAPTCHA is not enabled, a single IP is limited to 2 requests per minute.
setting.epayUseApiDescription: Default to redirect payment. If your Epay supports API, you can try enabling this option.
setting.apikey: Used for back-end interfacing, do not disclose and ensure key security
setting.captchaDriverDescription: Enable captcha to prevent malicious scripts
setting.redeemHTMLDescription: Customizable HTML content that will be displayed at the top of the redeem code share page
setting.redeemHTMLAbove: Redeem Code Share Page HTML Placed at the Top
setting.redeemHTMLAboveDescription: Customizable HTML content that will be displayed at the top of the redeem code share page
setting.telegramApiDescription: Customize the Telegram API address, suitable for situations where the backend cannot directly access Telegram. Leave empty to use the default address.
setting.captchaCustomUrlDescription: Only required for Cap driver, leave empty for others.
setting.showRegionDescription: Display the account region on the redeem share page

queue.inQueue: Pushed to queue, waiting for execution
queue.isRunning: Task is running, please try again later
